verbs.description: astronomers [V: have] discovered black holes do n't just eat stars when a dead star nears a black hole it usually ripped apart by the strength of the tidal forces surrounding it but astrophysicists have discovered that if a white dwarf passes an intermediate - sized black hole it can be brought back to life black holes
